Key Arguments: The bill threatens free speech in Australia.
The legislation is open to abuse by current and future governments.
It could be used to suppress debate before important events like referendums and elections.
The government itself has been guilty of spreading misinformation, particularly regarding COVID-19, so it cannot be trusted to regulate misinformation.
Notable Quotes: This bill will be the end of free speech in this country and must not be passed, now or ever!
This bill is something I would expect to have come from the pre-world war 2 German government and probably did.
